title: Rita's Important Lesson
description: Ritais a snow plow in Big Town and he has many other work truck friends. They call themselves The Road Crew. Come along with Rita as she experiences her most difficult winter ever. Will it snow? And if it doesn't, what will happen to her? See her friends work so hard to cheer her up and see if she learns a lesson in patience and friendship along the way.
author: T.C. Meadows
